PacketDefinitions.Description: This file contains common enum definitions which are used by server and client messages.

Enum.Name: ItemStorageKind
Enum.Description: Defines from or to which item storage an item is moved.

EnumValue.Name: Inventory
EnumValue.Description: The inventory storage.

EnumValue.Name: Trade
EnumValue.Description: The trade storage.

EnumValue.Name: Vault
EnumValue.Description: The vault storage.

EnumValue.Name: ChaosMachine
EnumValue.Description: The chaos machine storage.

EnumValue.Name: PlayerShop
EnumValue.Description: The player shop storage.

EnumValue.Name: PetTrainer
EnumValue.Description: The pet trainer dialog storage.

EnumValue.Name: Refinery
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the refinery of the elphis npc.

EnumValue.Name: Smelting
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the smelting dialog of the osbourne npc.

EnumValue.Name: ItemRestore
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the item restore dialog of the jerridon npc.

EnumValue.Name: ChaosCardMaster
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the chaos card master dialog.

EnumValue.Name: CherryBlossomSpirit
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the cherry blossom spirit dialog.

EnumValue.Name: SeedCrafting
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the seed crafting dialog.

EnumValue.Name: SeedSphereCrafting
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the seed sphere crafting dialog.

EnumValue.Name: SeedMountCrafting
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the seed sphere mount dialog.

EnumValue.Name: SeedUnmountCrafting
EnumValue.Description: The storage of the seed sphere unmount dialog.

Enum.Name: LegacyQuestState
Enum.Description: The quest state for the legacy quest system.

EnumValue.Name: Undefined
EnumValue.Description: The state is undefined. This value is used when there is no quest defined for a specific index

EnumValue.Name: Active
EnumValue.Description: The quest is active and in progress.

EnumValue.Name: Complete
EnumValue.Description: The quest was completed.

EnumValue.Name: Inactive
EnumValue.Description: The quest is inactive, that means it isn't active and wasn't completed yet.

Enum.Name: CharacterClassNumber
Enum.Description: Defines the values which are used for the character classes on client side.

EnumValue.Name: DarkWizard
EnumValue.Description: Value for the dark wizard character class.

EnumValue.Name: SoulMaster
EnumValue.Description: Value for the soul master character class.

EnumValue.Name: GrandMaster
EnumValue.Description: Value for the grand master character class.

EnumValue.Name: DarkKnight
EnumValue.Description: Value for the dark knight character class.

EnumValue.Name: BladeKnight
EnumValue.Description: Value for the blade knight character class.

EnumValue.Name: BladeMaster
EnumValue.Description: Value for the blade master character class.

EnumValue.Name: FairyElf
EnumValue.Description: Value for the fairy elf character class.

EnumValue.Name: MuseElf
EnumValue.Description: Value for the muse elf character class.

EnumValue.Name: HighElf
EnumValue.Description: Value for the high elf character class.

EnumValue.Name: MagicGladiator
EnumValue.Description: Value for the magic gladiator character class.

EnumValue.Name: DuelMaster
EnumValue.Description: Value for the duel master character class.

EnumValue.Name: DarkLord
EnumValue.Description: Value for the dark lord character class.

EnumValue.Name: LordEmperor
EnumValue.Description: Value for the lord emperor character class.

EnumValue.Name: Summoner
EnumValue.Description: Value for the summoner character class.

EnumValue.Name: BloodySummoner
EnumValue.Description: Value for the bloody summoner character class.

EnumValue.Name: DimensionMaster
EnumValue.Description: Value for the dimension master character class.

EnumValue.Name: RageFighter
EnumValue.Description: Value for the rage fighter character class.

EnumValue.Name: FistMaster
EnumValue.Description: Value for the fist master character class.

Enum.Name: CharacterStatAttribute
Enum.Description: Defines the type of a character stat attribute.

EnumValue.Name: Strength
EnumValue.Description: The strength attribute.

EnumValue.Name: Agility
EnumValue.Description: The agility attribute.

EnumValue.Name: Vitality
EnumValue.Description: The vitality attribute.

EnumValue.Name: Energy
EnumValue.Description: The energy attribute.

EnumValue.Name: Leadership
EnumValue.Description: The leadership attribute.

Enum.Name: CharacterHeroState
Enum.Description: Defines the hero state of a character.

EnumValue.Name: New
EnumValue.Description: The character is new and has the highest state.

EnumValue.Name: Hero
EnumValue.Description: The character is a hero.

EnumValue.Name: LightHero
EnumValue.Description: The character is a hero, but the state is almost gone.

EnumValue.Name: Normal
EnumValue.Description: The character is in a neutral state.

EnumValue.Name: PlayerKillWarning
EnumValue.Description: The character killed another character, and has a kill warning.

EnumValue.Name: PlayerKiller1stStage
EnumValue.Description: The character killed two characters, and has some restrictions.

EnumValue.Name: PlayerKiller2ndStage
EnumValue.Description: The character killed more than two characters, and has hard restrictions.

Enum.Name: LogOutType
Enum.Description: Describes the way how the player wants to leave the current game.

EnumValue.Name: CloseGame
EnumValue.Description: The player wants to close the game.

EnumValue.Name: BackToCharacterSelection
EnumValue.Description: The player wants to go back to the character selection screen.

EnumValue.Name: BackToServerSelection
EnumValue.Description: The player wants to go back to the server selection screen.

Enum.Name: MiniGameType
Enum.Description: Defines the type of the mini game.

EnumValue.Name: Undefined
EnumValue.Description: Undefined mini game type.

EnumValue.Name: DevilSquare
EnumValue.Description: The devil square mini game.

EnumValue.Name: BloodCastle
EnumValue.Description: The blood castle mini game.

EnumValue.Name: CursedTemple
EnumValue.Description: The cursed temple mini game.

EnumValue.Name: ChaosCastle
EnumValue.Description: The chaos castle mini game.

EnumValue.Name: IllusionTemple
EnumValue.Description: The illusion temple mini game.

EnumValue.Name: Doppelganger
EnumValue.Description: The doppelgänger mini game.
